fields.name: chest
fields.label: Chest
fields.description: Diagonal fold half the distance between anterior axillary line and the nipple.

fields.name: abdomen
fields.label: Abdomen
fields.description: Vertical fold 2cm to the right of the navel.

fields.name: thigh
fields.label: Thigh
fields.description: Midpoint of the anterior side of the upper leg between the patella and top of thigh.

fields.name: tricep
fields.label: Tricep
fields.description: Vertical fold at the midpoint of the posterior side of tricep between shoulder and elbow with arm relaxed at the side.

fields.name: suprailiac
fields.label: Suprailiac
fields.description: Diagonal fold parallel and superior to the iliac crest.

fields.name: thigh
fields.label: Thigh
fields.description: Midpoint of the anterior side of the upper leg between the patella and top of thigh.
